name: Myspace Memories
author: Tom
description: Thanks for the add! You have 1 friends. A nostalgic trip to 2005.

messages: Thanks for the add! You're in my Top 8 now.
Have you customized your profile HTML yet?
Your code would look great with some <marquee> tags.
I see you're writing code. Is it for your profile?
Tom says hi! He's everyone's first friend.
This code needs more glitter GIFs.
Back in my day, we wrote CSS in <style> tags on our profiles.
Your profile song should be 'Welcome to the Black Parade'.
Don't forget to add me to your Top Friends!
Is this code emo enough? Needs more black backgrounds.
Have you tried adding a hit counter to track visitors?
Your code is giving me 2005 vibes and I'm here for it.
RAWR XD means 'I love you' in dinosaur.
I miss when the internet was ugly and beautiful.
This function is in my extended network now.
Bulletin: New code just dropped! Check it out!
A/S/L? Just kidding, tell me about your variables.
Your while loop is so scene. Very aesthetic.
